main event: A large, irregular white object was sighted over Eagle Pass, Texas on November 26, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 seconds., The object had no sound and emitted a bright light., There was a similar speed and altitude maintained as a first object., The estimated speed of the object was around 1000 miles per hour., The observer, who is an Air Force veteran, reported seeing this unusual object alongside a smaller first object.
witness description: Air Force veteran, calm but highly concerned
